record.field: belgian_companies = self.env.companies.filtered(lambda c: c.country_id.code == 'BE') ip_eligible_version = self.env['hr.version'].search([ ('job_id.l10n_be_contract_ip', '=', True), ('ip', '=', False), ('company_id', 'in', belgian_companies.ids), ]) if ip_eligible_version: warning_count = len(ip_eligible_version) warning_records = ip_eligible_version

belgian_companies = self.env.companies.filtered(lambda c: c.country_id.code == 'BE') tax_exemption_eligible_version = self.env['hr.version'].search([ ('rd_percentage', '=', 0), ('job_id.l10n_be_contract_withholding_taxes_exemption', '=', True), ('employee_id.certificate', 'in', ['bachelor', 'master', 'doctor', 'civil_engineer']), ('company_id', 'in', belgian_companies.ids), ]) if tax_exemption_eligible_version: warning_count = len(tax_exemption_eligible_version) warning_records = tax_exemption_eligible_version
